name: Hound Dog
description:
Hound Dog

Hound Dog is a short story driven adventure game. 

The story begins in Houndwood, Los Angeles, set in 1940. There has been a robbery at Barkswell Bank.  As Detective Hound, you must investigate the crime scene and collect clues in order to solve the crime!

Controls

WASD: Move

Mouse: Look

Left Mouse Button Click: Button Select

E: Examine Item 

SPACE: Sniff For Clues

A student made project by Sophie Davenport

See the development of this project here: https://hounddogvideogameproduction.blogspot.com/
